name: node-red-storage-valkey
description: Valkey/Redis storage module for Node-RED with pub/sub auto-reload support

scripts.build: tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && npm run build:rename && npm run build:fix-imports
scripts.build:rename: mv dist/cjs/index.js dist/index.cjs && mv dist/cjs/index.d.ts dist/index.d.cts && mv dist/cjs/storage.js dist/storage.cjs && mv dist/cjs/types.js dist/types.cjs && rm -rf dist/cjs
scripts.build:fix-imports: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); let content = fs.readFileSync('dist/index.cjs', 'utf8'); content = content.replace(/require\(\".\/storage\.js\"\)/g, 'require(\"./storage.cjs\")').replace(/require\(\".\/types\.js\"\)/g, 'require(\"./types.cjs\")'); fs.writeFileSync('dist/index.cjs', content);"

author: Siphion
